main_menu_greeting: Hi, {user_name}! 👋 What would you like to do?
error_occurred_try_again: An error occurred, please try again.
no_subscription_options_available: No subscription options available at the moment.
payment_service_unavailable: Payment service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
error_creating_payment_record: Error creating payment record. Please try again later.
error_payment_gateway_link_failed: Failed to get payment link. Please contact support.
payment_link_message: To pay for {months} mo. subscription, click the button below:
error_payment_gateway: Payment gateway error. Please try again later or contact support.
payment_successful_error_details: ✅ Payment succeeded, but an error occurred displaying details. Your subscription is active. Contact support if anything is wrong.
payment_successful_full: ✅ Payment successful! Your {months}-month subscription is active until {end_date}. Connection key: {config_link} To connect, open the link and follow the instructions 👇
payment_successful_with_promo_full: ✅ Payment successful! Your {months}-month subscription (with promo bonus +{bonus_days} days) is active until {end_date}. Connection key: {config_link} To connect, open the link and follow the instructions 👇
payment_successful_with_referral_bonus_f: ✅ Payment successful! Your {months}-month subscription (base end date: {base_end_date}) has been extended by {bonus_days} bonus days for referral from {inviter_name} and is now active until {final_end_date}. Connection key: {config_link} To connect, open the link and follow the instructions 👇
payment_failed: ❌ Payment failed or was cancelled. Please try again or contact support.
my_subscription_details: 🔐 My Subscription: Status: {status} Active until: {end_date} (days left: {days_left}) Traffic: {traffic_used} of {traffic_limit} Configuration link: {config_link}
subscription_not_active: You have no active subscription. Would you like to purchase one?
error_service_unavailable: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
promo_code_not_found: Promo code {code} not found, expired, or already used the maximum number of times.
promo_code_already_used_by_user: You have already used promo code {code}.
promo_code_applied_success_full: ✅ Promo code applied successfully! Subscription active until {end_date}. Connection key: {config_link} To connect, open the link and follow the instructions 👇
error_applying_promo_bonus: Failed to apply promo bonus. Please try again later or contact support.
trial_already_had_subscription_or_trial: You have already used a free trial or had a paid subscription. Free trial is available only once for new users.
trial_activated_details_message: 🚀 Your {days}-day free trial is activated! Valid until: {end_date} Traffic: {traffic_gb} GB Your configuration link: {config_link}
trial_activation_failed: Failed to activate free trial. Please try again later.
trial_activation_failed_panel_link: Failed to link your account to the server for trial activation. Please try again later.
trial_activation_failed_db: Database error during trial activation. Please try again later.
trial_activation_failed_panel_update: Failed to update trial details on the server. Please try again later.
user_not_found_for_trial: Your account was not found in the system. Please run /start first.
referral_program_info_new: 🎁 Referral Program 📊 Your stats: 👥 Friends invited: {invited_count} 💳 Purchased subscription: {purchased_count} 🔗 Your link: {referral_link} 💰 Invitation bonuses: {bonus_details} 📢 Share the link with friends and get bonuses!
referral_bonus_per_period: 🎁 For a friend's {months}-month subscription: ➢ You: {inviter_bonus_days} days ➢ Friend: {referee_bonus_days} days
referral_friend_message: 🚀 Hey! Try this VPN - it's fast, reliable and affordable!  🎁 Use my link to get bonus days with your subscription!  {referral_link}
referral_bonus_inviter_notification_exte: 🎉 Congrats! Your friend {referee_name} paid for a subscription. You received {days} bonus days! Your subscription is now active until {new_end_date}.
referral_bonus_inviter_notification_new_: 🎉 Congrats! Your friend {referee_name} paid for a subscription. You received a {days}-day bonus subscription! It is active until {new_end_date}.
user_is_banned: 🚫 Your account is banned. Please contact support.
admin_broadcast_confirm_prompt: You are about to send the following message (first 200 characters):  {message_preview}  Confirm sending?
admin_broadcast_cancelled_nav_back: Broadcast cancelled. You are returned to the admin panel.
admin_promo_invalid_validity_days: Validity period (in days) must be a positive number.
admin_promo_created_success: ✅ Promo code {code} created successfully! Bonus: {bonus_days} days Max uses: {max_activations} Valid until: {valid_until_str}.
admin_promo_prompt_bonus_days: Enter the new number of bonus days:
admin_promo_prompt_max_activations: Enter the new maximum number of activations:
admin_promo_prompt_validity_days: Enter the new validity period in days (0 for indefinite):
admin_ban_user_prompt: Enter user ID or @username to ban:
admin_unban_user_prompt: Enter user ID or @username to unban:
admin_prompt_for_user_id_or_username_log: Enter user ID or @username to view logs:
sync_completed: ✅ Sync with panel completed. Status: {status}. Details: {details}
sync_completed_details: Checked: {total_checked} entries. Users synced/updated: {users_synced}. Subscriptions synced/updated: {subs_synced}.
sync_completed_with_errors_details: Checked: {total_checked} entries. Users synced/updated: {users_synced}. Subscriptions synced/updated: {subs_synced}. Errors: {errors_count}.  First errors: {error_details_preview}
admin_panel_user_creation_failed: ❌ Failed to create panel user for TG ID {user_id}. Panel unreachable?
error_displaying_logs_too_long: Error: logs too long to display in one message. Try viewing logs for a specific user.
subscription_72h_notification: 👋 Hi, {user_name}!  ⏳ Your VPN subscription expires in 3 days — {end_date}.  Please renew it using the button below.
subscription_48h_notification: 👋 Hi, {user_name}!  ⏳ Your VPN subscription expires in 2 days — {end_date}.  Please renew it using the button below.
subscription_24h_notification: 👋 Hi, {user_name}!  ⏳ Your VPN subscription expires in 1 day — {end_date}.  Please renew it using the button below.
subscription_expired_notification: 👋 Hi, {user_name}!  ⛔ Your VPN subscription expired on {end_date}.  Please renew it using the button below.
subscription_expired_yesterday_notificat: 👋 Hi, {user_name}!  ⏳ Your VPN subscription expired yesterday ({end_date}).  Please renew it using the button below.
tribute_subscription_cancelled: 🚨 Subscription Cancelled Your Tribute subscription has been cancelled. You have 24 hours to restore access, after which the subscription will be blocked. To renew your subscription, press the button below.
tribute_auto_renewal: 🔄 Subscription Auto-Renewed Your Tribute subscription has been automatically renewed for {months} months. New expiration date: {end_date}
admin_user_management_prompt: 👤 User Management  Enter user ID or @username to search:
admin_user_trial_reset_success: ✅ Trial reset! User can activate trial again.
admin_user_add_subscription_prompt: ➕ Adding subscription days for user {user_id}  Enter number of days to add:
admin_user_invalid_days: ❌ Invalid number of days. Enter number from 1 to 3650.
admin_user_send_message_prompt: ✉️ Sending message to user {user_id}  Enter message text:
inline_user_stats_message: 👥 User Statistics 📊 Total: {total} 📈 Active today: {active_today} 💳 With paid subscription: {paid} 🆓 On trial period: {trial} 😴 Inactive: {inactive} 🚫 Banned: {banned} 🎁 Via referral program: {referral}
inline_financial_stats_message: 💰 Financial Statistics 📅 Today: {today:.2f} RUB ({today_count} payments) 📅 Week: {week:.2f} RUB 📅 Month: {month:.2f} RUB 🏆 All time: {all_time:.2f} RUB
inline_system_stats_message: 🖥 Panel Statistics 🟢 Online: {online} 📊 Active: {active} 🔴 Disabled: {disabled} ⏰ Expired: {expired} ⚠️ Limited: {limited} 👥 Total users: {total} 💾 RAM Usage: {memory:.1f}% 📊 Week traffic: {week_traffic} 📊 Month traffic: {month_traffic} 🔗 Active nodes: {active_nodes}/{total_nodes}
log_payment_received: {provider_emoji} Payment Received 👤 User: {user_display} 💰 Amount: {amount} {currency} 📅 Period: {months} mo. 🏦 Provider: {payment_provider} 🕐 Time: {timestamp}
log_promo_activation: 🎁 Promo Code Activated 👤 User: {user_display} 🏷 Code: {promo_code} 🎯 Bonus: +{bonus_days}d 🕐 Time: {timestamp}
log_suspicious_promo:

admin_bulk_promo_step4_validity: 📦 Bulk Promo Code Creation Step 4 of 4: Validity Period Quantity: {quantity} Bonus days: {bonus_days} Max activations: {max_activations} Choose the validity period for promo codes:

admin_promo_step2_bonus_days: 🎟 Create Promo Code Step 2 of 4: Bonus Days Code: {code} Enter the number of bonus days (1-365):

admin_promo_enter_validity_days: ⏰ Enter the number of validity days for the promo code (1-365):
